summary: Congress directed the General Services Administration and the Office of Management and Budget to come up with a program to make it easier for agencies to buy lower-price items from commercial online marketplaces. The agencies' implementation plan for this program: identified 3 potential e-commerce models, including one in which a third-party provides software that allows price comparisons across multiple portals recommended changes in law needed...
title: Buying Commercial Products: Assessment of the E-Commerce Portal Implementation Plan
